item.description:
New Features and Improvements:

  • 📝 Added support for multiple custom prompts - Now you can create and manage multiple custom prompts.
  • 🎚️ Toggle/Change custom prompts from Notch Recorder Panel - Easily toggle/ switch between custom prompts directly from the Notch Recorder Panel.
  • 🚫 ESC key works globally to cancel recordingView - Press the ESC key anytime to cancel the recording view, no matter what app you are using.
  • 🧠 Improved AI transcription with Context Awareness - Enhanced transcription accuracy with better context understanding.
  • 🐞 Minor Improvements & other bug fixes - General stability improvements and bug fixes for a smoother experience.
